explanation:
code_hardening: Added null and empty input checks returning an empty list, validated that the delimiter is not a double-quote, and ensured the final token is always added after the loop regardless of delimiter placement or unmatched quotes.
resolve_compilation_errors: none.
exception_handling: none; the method follows existing utility-class patterns and avoids throwing exceptions.
logic_customization: Generalized the logic into a reusable static method with parameters (String input, char delimiter), replaced hardcoded comma checks with the provided delimiter, moved end-of-string handling to a single post-loop addition, and stripped all double-quote characters from each token using org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.replace(String, String, String).
refactoring: Renamed loop variables to start, current, and inQuotes for clarity, removed hardcoded input and test data, and changed the return type to List<String>.
misc: Added a brief inline comment describing behavior and kept formatting consistent with the existing Strings utility class style.
